title: Black screen on calls. Doesn't matter which type of call
content:
Hey,
I am using Google Pixel XL, The Last 2 weeks screen becoming completely black and I can turn on the screen until the call is finish. I can't hang up the call even I want to and I need to wait until the call is finished. Then I can use the phone. I tried restarting, removing some applications but nothing helps 
The phone really useless like this
Any suggestions?
Thanks in advance
